title: Person of Interest Episode 5 - Judgement - Final Scene
author: AwesomeGai21109
comment: In the future, even if I love a show as much as Person of Interest (I loved it so much especially before season 4), nothing will ever change the fact that Reese and Finch are my all time favorite fictional characters.

To the person asking, the reason Reese is smiling at the menu is because at the beginning of the episode he met Finch in the same restaurant. He tries to ask him "what's good" on the menu, trying to determine if Finch is a regular at the restaurant and thus learn a little more about him. However, Finch is elusive and hands him the menu with the number for their next case hidden inside.
Many series may come and go .. but this one remains Epic forever .. love for person of interest .. ❤
This show was beyond perfect in the previous years.

Carter, "Ok, who beat, shot, tied everyone up, scared the crap out of all of you, and brought down your entire operation?"
Crooks, "some tall guy in a suit."
description: Here's the final scene from episode 5 of Person of Interest. The song is "Intro" by The XX. Sorry if the volume is too loud, by the way.
